document_data.name: Tindertwig
document_data.mainbody: A '''tindertwig''' was an [[alchemical]] tool used to easily light fires.
document_data.Description: It was a tiny wooden stick with an alchemical substance applied to one end.
document_data.Powers: When the alchemical substance was struck against something rough, it ignited automatically, much quicker than a [[flint and steel]], let alone with a [[magnifying glass]], and without additional tinder. They made lighting [[torch]]es and other fires easier and faster.
document_data.Creation: Related to [[alchemist's fire]] and [[smokestick]]s, tindertwigs required skill in alchemy and spellcasting to make.
document_data.Availability: Tindertwigs were worth 1 [[gp]] each. They were sold among various adventuring supplies, such as by [[Undermountain]] merchant [[Malvar]] around [[1375 DR]].<ref>
document_data.History:
Five tindertwigs and a vial of alchemist's fire were found behind some [[deathsbreath mushroom]]s in [[Hekkut|Hekkut the Molted]]'s bandit base in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in 1372; it's unknown why they were there.<ref> 

A hundred tindertwigs were part of a cargo of supplies sent from [[Waterdeep]] to [[Swordhold]] in 1372 DR.<ref>
